name: Sapphire 130iB
headline: Plaster-over invisible loudspeaker
description: The compact Sapphire that delivers refined, immersive sound with discreet integration—an elegant solution for boutique retail, luxury hospitality, and considered residential spaces.
heroCopy: Compact Sapphire refinement — immersive sound, quietly concealed behind plaster.
story: As the younger sibling of the full-size Sapphire loudspeakers, the Sapphire 130iB delivers immersive, high-quality sound while remaining discreetly integrated into your space. Featuring the proprietary Symphony Cell resin-impregnated composite soundboard and a meticulously optimised aluminium frame, it offers a rich, articulate presentation with slightly less low-frequency extension than its larger siblings. Designed for projects where performance, discretion, and installation efficiency matter, the 130iB proves that a smaller form can still feel unmistakably sophisticated.
definition: Compact plaster-over invisible loudspeaker for refined distributed audio.
finish: Plaster-over (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
drivers: Symphony Cell soundboard with exciter drive system

items.label: Sensitivity
items.value: 76 dB (82 dB SPL equivalent without plaster)

applications: Heritage properties with limited cavity space
Conference facilities and meeting rooms (speech clarity)
Luxury hospitality suites and fine dining
Music-focused spaces (pair with subwoofer for full extension)

lifestyle.caption: A compact silhouette with a composed face—designed to vanish behind plaster while keeping the room’s architecture perfectly uninterrupted.
Rear geometry and mounting detail that support precise, efficient installation—built for discreet integration and long-term stability.
A clean back view that underlines the engineered structure—optimised for controlled resonance and a refined, even presentation.

name: Sapphire 250
headline: High performance fully-covered invisible loudspeaker
description: The Sapphire sweet spot—balanced, versatile, and exceptionally discreet, delivering confident full-bandwidth performance with remarkable installation flexibility.
heroCopy: The Sapphire balance — full-bandwidth clarity with flexible, fully-covered installation.
story: The Sapphire 250 represents a refined balance of performance, versatility, and installation flexibility. Built on years of acoustic innovation, it pairs a precision-engineered Symphony Cell composite soundboard with an optimized dual-exciter configuration to deliver articulate, room-filling sound with complete invisibility. Its narrow form factor supports installation between studs or joists on 400mm centres or greater, while the slim profile enables placement in spaces where traditional speakers simply cannot fit.
definition: Versatile fully-covered invisible loudspeaker delivering balanced full-range performance.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
drivers: Symphony Cell soundboard with dual-exciter drive system

items.label: Sensitivity
items.value: 82 dB (2.83 V / 1 m) (88 dB SPL equivalent without plaster)

applications: Heritage properties with limited cavity space
Music-focused environments requiring balanced full-range performance

lifestyle.caption: A slim, confident profile—engineered to disappear behind premium finishes while maintaining a composed, full-bandwidth presentation.
Precision detailing and controlled structure—designed to support clean finishing and a more linear, transparent sound.
A rear view that reflects the engineering behind the silence—built for stability, resonance control, and discreet integration.

name: Sapphire 375
headline: High output fully-covered invisible loudspeaker
description: Greater scale and authority for larger rooms—an invisible loudspeaker designed for elevated output while preserving Sapphire refinement and architectural discretion.
heroCopy: More scale, more authority — Sapphire refinement, fully concealed.
story: Designed for spaces that demand more scale and authority, the Sapphire 375 extends the Sapphire experience with higher output capability and confident room-filling presence—while remaining completely concealed behind your chosen finish. Built around the same Sapphire principles of tonal transparency and architectural freedom, it supports premium installations where discretion is non-negotiable and performance must feel effortless.
definition: High-output fully-covered invisible loudspeaker for larger rooms and elevated background-to-foreground listening.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
drivers: Symphony Cell soundboard with high-output exciter drive system

items.label: Specifications
items.value: Refer to official Sapphire 375 datasheet for full specifications

lifestyle.caption: A composed profile that signals capability—built for larger spaces while remaining completely silent in the architecture.
Clean, engineered detailing—supporting refined finishing and controlled performance where output and discretion must coexist.
A rear view that emphasises structure and stability—designed to support confident output with the Sapphire signature of restraint.
